alert.note: Alert for Clay; Clinton; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:16AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clinton, western Clay and northeastern Platte Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 916 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Platte City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Liberty, Gladstone, Smithville, Kearney, Platte City, Pleasant Valley, Trimble, Glenaire, Camden Point, Ferrelview, Holt, Tracy, River Bend, Ridgely, Kansas City Intl Arpt and Hoover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 14 and 32. Interstate 29 between mile markers 11 and 27. Interstate 435 between mile markers 28 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
